questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230

videos.src: assets/videos/ALAN – COMBI-MAX-MBXXX/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET

questions.question: shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/ALAN – COMBI-MAX-MBXXX/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE

questions.question: then replace the power cord with the new one
check the continuity of fuse and confirm whether the fuse is defective.
replace the fuse with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the switch is defective.
replace the switch accordingly
check for any carbon formation or breakage of input pin connector.
replace the input pin connector with a new one
check and confirm whether the power supply board output is available.

videos.videoName: Video for checking power supply O/P Volt

questions.question: repair or replace the power supply board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing Power supply board

questions.question: , check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from power supply to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
cross check the control board with another and confirm whether the board is defective.
repair or replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the control board is connected properly to main board.
reseat the control board accordingly
repair or replace the main board accordingly
confirm whether there is a RF Output in Cut or Coagulation mode.
check the foot switch cable continuity and confirm whether it is defective.
replace the foot switch Cable with a new one
check and confirm whether the foot switch is defective.

videos.videoName: Video for checking foot switch continuity

questions.question: replace the foot switch with a new one
cross check the cautery pencil with another and confirm whether it is defective.
replace the cautery pencil with new one
repair or replace the control Board

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Control board

questions.question: , confirm whether the display is blank and appears as white screen, when the equipment is ON.
check and confirm for any loose connection or breakage of cable from display to display control board
replace or reseat the cable accordingly
repair or replace the display board with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist.

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Display Board

questions.question: repair or replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the earth pad alarm or Beep appears when connected.
check the connecting points for any carbon or debris formation or loose connection.
clean the connecting point and connect the earth pad back
cross check the earth pad with another and confirm whether it is defective.
replace the earth pad with a new one
repair or replace the main Board with a new one
check and confirm whether the buttons do not respond while pressing.
check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from keypad to switch control board.
reseat or replace the cables accordingly
check and confirm the switch is defective.

videos.videoName: Video for checking the switch continuity

questions.question: replace the switch with a new one
repair or replace the switch control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the display is blank / plain.
check for any loose connections from display-to-display control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
replace the display with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team through video call for any other assistance.
Thanks
